name: MiniTowers
description:
How about add some physics to the classic Tetris? Here, the goal is stacking your pieces to build the highest tower possible!

Play against AI or by yourself. How high can you reach?

🕹  Controls
Move: A, D or Left/Right Arrow or Swipes
Rotate: W or Up Arrow or Tap
Speed Up: S, Down Arrow or Swipe Down

👩🏻‍💻 Code 
Orlando Batista 

🎨 2D Assets
